rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with wide door and tactile guidance. North-facing orientation to align with Vastu principles.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, Scandinavian minimalist design.
Modern dining area integrated into the living space, accentuating minimalistic Scandinavian style with light fixtures and wooden accents.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances, open-plan integration with the dining area, designed for ease of movement including wheelchair accessibility.
Spacious master bedroom featuring ample storage and floor-to-ceiling windows for light, designed with Scandinavian simplicity in mind.
Cozy second bedroom with integrated storage solutions and built-in wardrobes, maintaining a minimalist aesthetic.
Sleek third bedroom offering comfortable space with Scandinavian design elements, optimized for wheelchair access if required.
Fourth bedroom designed for additional guest or family use, ensuring accessibility and adherence to Scandinavian style.
Fifth bedroom with functional layout and ample storage, maintaining a modern minimalist aesthetic.
Quiet study area incorporating Scandinavian design with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, integrated into the living space.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door providing a welcoming entry in accordance with Vastu principles, equipped with ramp for wheelchair access.
Multiple floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Garage door entrance for a two-car garage ensuring easy access from the driveway.

additional_features.description: Accessible rooftop terrace with panoramic views and ample space for relaxation, integrated with Scandinavian design aesthetics.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor plan ensuring proximity to the entrance.
